title: Emmerdale casino boss Terry is a familiar face from another ITV drama

Trouble has arrived in Emmerdale for Mandy Dingle and her son Vinny but it was a face that viewers had seen before.

Lisa Riley's character Mandy has found herself in a spot of bother when casino boss Terry came calling.

The ITV soap saw arrival of danger in the shape of a person that had been scouring the country for Mandy and Vinny.

Mandy had wanted to disappear with Vinny but had been convinced to stay as it was not the best time to leave the Dingle family behind.

It proved to be a bad decision as Terry caught up with Vinny in the village before dragging him to his car and insisting that he called Mandy.

Mandy tried to insist that she had only 'borrowed' the money from Terry and not stolen it, as he had thought.

Even so, time is running out and she now only had 48 hours to find the £20,000 she owes the casino manager.

Despite the high drama, all viewers could concentrate on was where they had seen Terry before.

Twitter soon had the answer for them as it was revealed that actor Rene Zagger played PC Nick Klein in The Bill, over 15 years ago.

One eagle-eyed viewer tweeted: "Oh look its PC Nick Klein from the bill #Emmerdale"

Another was pleased to see him: "OMG #ReneZagger aka #PCNickKlein from #TheBill as Terry in @ITV @emmerdale still looking sexy as ever ;)"

Before pitching up in Emmerdale, Rene Zagger was best known for playing the popular PC in ITV cop show The Bill, between 1999 and 2004.

Rene got his acting break when he played a young Marti Pellow in one of Wet Wet Wet's videos.

He went on to have roles in Silent Witness, Doctor Who and Wycliffe.
